component.name: ImageFan Reloaded
component.summary: Light-weight image viewer, supporting multi-core processing

description.p: ImageFan Reloaded is a light-weight image viewer, supporting multi-core processing.
ImageFan Reloaded features mouse-only interaction, using the left and the right mouse buttons, and the mouse wheel:

ul.li: the left mouse button for selecting, opening, zooming in, zooming out, and dragging images
the right mouse button for returning to the main view
the mouse wheel for moving back and forward through thumbnails and opened images
